com.mapbox.services.navigation.v5

Class RouteUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.navigation.v5.RouteUtils

  • public class RouteUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A few utilities to work with RouteLeg objects.
    Since:
    1.3.0

      • RouteUtils

        public RouteUtils(double offRouteThresholdKm)
        RouteUtils constructor allowing you to pass in a threshold value.
        Parameters:
        offRouteThresholdKm - Double value using unit kilometers. This value determines the distance till you are notified.
        Since:
        1.3.0

    • Method Detail

      • getOffRouteThresholdKm

        public double getOffRouteThresholdKm()
        Returns:
        the RouteUtils threshold as a double value; defaults 100 meters.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • isInStep

        public boolean isInStep(Position position,
                        RouteLeg route,
                        int stepIndex)
                 throws ServicesException,
                        TurfException
        Compute the distance between the position and the step line (the closest point), and checks if it's within the off-route threshold.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to verify is on or near the route step. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        route - a directions route.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in route.
        Returns:
        true if the position is outside the OffRoute threshold.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getDistanceToStep

        public double getDistanceToStep(Position position,
                                RouteLeg route,
                                int stepIndex)
                         throws ServicesException,
                                TurfException
        Computes the distance between the position and the closest point in route step.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to measure distance to from route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        route - a directions route.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in route.
        Returns:
        double value giving distance in kilometers.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getSnapToRoute

        public Position getSnapToRoute(Position position,
                               RouteLeg route,
                               int stepIndex)
                        throws ServicesException,
                               TurfException
        Snaps given position to a RouteLeg step.
        Parameters:
        position - that you want to snap to route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        route - that you want to snap position to.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in route.
        Returns:
        your position snapped to the route.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • isOffRoute

        public boolean isOffRoute(Position position,
                          RouteLeg route)
                   throws ServicesException,
                          TurfException
        Method to check whether the position given is outside the route using the threshold.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to verify is on or near the route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        route - a directions route.
        Returns:
        true if the position is beyond the threshold limit from the route.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getClosestStep

        public int getClosestStep(Position position,
                          RouteLeg route)
                   throws ServicesException,
                          TurfException
        Get the closest route step to the given position.
        Parameters:
        position - that you want to get closest route step to.
        route - a directions route.
        Returns:
        integer step index in route leg.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0
